Make an informative website: Add interaction to your website with JavaScript
JavaScript makes it possible to run code in response to events on your web page. Use JavaScript to make it possible for visitors to your website to interact with it in some way.
Build a simple game on your website, such as hangman or noughts and crosses.

Ideas for JavaScript projects: https://devdevshow.com/javascript-projects-for-beginners-with-source-code/ 
Working with data and APIs in JavaScript: https://thecodingtrain.com/Courses/data-and-apis/
